summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsHSA/FSA eligibleCeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Wash with 10% BPO for Face & Body is CeraVe's first acne-treatment product with maximum OTC strength 10% benzoyl peroxide is developed with dermatologists & clinically tested to clear, treat, and help prevent acne pimples and blackheads on the face and body.
details: DetailsBenefitsClears face & body acne pimples and blackheadsDoes not disrupt the skin barrierGentle on skinLeaves skin feeling comfortable, smooth, and looking clarifiedFeaturesDeveloped with dermatologists, this lightly foaming, creamy face and body wash treats face & body acne without drying or flakingWith a patent pending formula that combines benzoyl peroxide, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and three essential ceramides, this acne wash is effective in clearing and helping to prevent new acne pimples and cleanses without disrupting the skin‚Äôs protective barrierSkin is left feeling comfortable, smooth, and looking clarifiedFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensItem 2611319How To UseApply a dime-size amount to damp skin and gently massage, avoiding the eye area. Rinse well. Use acne face wash on entire affected area one to two times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day. If going outside, apply sunscreen after using this product. If irritation or sensitivity develops, stop use of both products or ask a doctor.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Potassium Hydroxide, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Niacinamide, Glycolic Acid, Trideceth-6, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Propanediol, Tetrasodium Edta, Caprylyl Glycol, Diethylhexyl Sodium Sulfosuccinate, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Benzoic Acid, Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate.
how_to_use: Apply a dime-size amount to damp skin and gently massage, avoiding the eye area. Rinse well. Use acne face wash on entire affected area one to two times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day. If going outside, apply sunscreen after using this product. If irritation or sensitivity develops, stop use of both products or ask a doctor.

reviews.headline: 10% wash
reviews.comments: I decided to try this after using the 4% with no issues, and all I was left with was a consistent itchy pain that's still lasting more than 24hours. It doesn't matter how much moisturizer you put on. You could use the whole bottle and the dryness and itch would still be there. It might just be too strong for me but if you were considering the stronger basic medicated face wash, stick with the 4%. I would never use this one again. The cream does not foam or smell and feels like I'm wiping toothpaste on my face. They really need to get the foaming together on both.

reviews.headline: Bleaches your towels
reviews.comments: Bleached my washcloth, so I'm guessing it just bleaches acne on your face. Yuck! Super mad about my Frontgate washcloth. Tossed it.

reviews.headline: PLEASE READ!!
reviews.comments: I have been loving and using this cleanser for the last 3 years and I love using it to clear any acne or random pimples I might get on my face!! I have extremely sensitive and oily skin, and this has been the only cleanser that I have loved using. I also love that this cleanser reduces redness and inflammation. If you are looking for a great cleanser for acne THIS is the one, but of course not all products will work for every ones skin type üòÅ

reviews.headline: Cleared my weird nose whiteheads!
reviews.comments: Last summer i was getting nearly constant whiteheads on my nose.. which I'd never had before. I have sebaceous filaments and occasionally blackheads but never whiteheads. This cleared it up within a week or two and I've never broken out there again! Now this past week I was a little too excessive wjth a lip product and had a few small whiteheads on my upper lip line and they're all dried up within a few days! I don't really break out so it's great to have this on the shelf if/when I need jt. I know the 10% BP looks scary because its so high strength but honestly it only caused minimum redness/a little bit of dryness. Nothing crazy; nothing that didnt' clear up within a week or so.

reviews.headline: THIS SAVED MY SKIN!!!!
reviews.comments: i have been struggling for the last year with tiny clogged pores and cystic acne and i have tried so many things to get rid of it. everything was either not effective, made it worse, or irriated my skin. i was scared to try this because of how strong it can be but i was shocked at how gentle yet effective it is!! my skin has cleared up so much in the last 2 months or so of using this cleanser, i couldn't be happier. i have never left a review for a beauty product in my life but i HAD to for this. buying this forever & ever!!!

reviews.headline: Lifesaver
reviews.comments: I have hormonal acne and have tried so many cleansers and nothing works as well as this.  For my acne type, Salicylic acid does not help but the benzoyl does.  I use it 2x a day and I've never had a bad reaction even when i was using retinol.  I love this product!!

reviews.headline: Buy this if you have acne
reviews.comments: Love this product.  It is more expensive but very gentle on the skin. I just think it's a better product than other brands. I'm willing to pay a little more for something that benefits my skin better

reviews.headline: Helped clear me up
reviews.comments: Since I started doing my makeup again iv been having more brake outs. Since I started using this my face has been clearing up

reviews.headline: Works, but I wouldn't use it again.
reviews.comments:
It was effective, but here are the reasons I wouldn't use it again:

1. It burns, so I wouldn't recommend it if you have sensitive skin.
2. It has a chemical smell. Again, I wouldn't recommend it if you are sensitive to unpleasant scents.
3. The product title says "foaming," but it does not.

reviews.headline: For sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Highly recommend this product! I do have slightly sensitive skin, but this clears uo my acne. I only use this specific product once or twice a week along with my other daily use cerave product. If you have sensitive skin be sure to moisturize very well after use. Leaves a burning and itchy sensation of you don't rehydrate your skin!

reviews.headline: clears acne
reviews.comments: This cleared my acne in under two weeks. I use it for my chest and face once every 3 days and it works wonders!!

reviews.headline: First acne product that has helped me
reviews.comments: I've dealt with mild acne my whole life, but it's gotten a bit worse since I've turned 30. I tried this on a whim since benxyol peroxide products do seem to help more than others (I've tried quite a few different brands of gels and creams). Since using this wash, I rarely get breakouts. It hasn't completely stopped my acne, but it is worlds better than what it was. I use it in the morning and before bed. I don't have sensitive skin, but this wash seems pretty gentle. It hasn't dried me out, but I do always apply moisturizer after washing. Just super grateful to have found something that helps.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I finally had it with my acne as I recently started breaking out randomly. This helps SO MUCH. It's not magic obviously, but after about a month, my acne decreased by like 75%. I use it consistently with a salicylic acid spot treatment and my acne is practically gone. I DO NOT recommend doing that if you have sensitive skin. Mine is very average "normal" The 10% doesnt dry me out or cause irritation. The only annoying thing is if you don't get it 100% off after, you can bleach your clothing. Make sure you rinse really well all over and use a towel you don't care about just in case. Once I rinsed more thoroughly, I didnt have that issue.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend for face if you use acids
reviews.comments: I wouldn't consider my skin sensitive since I use acids and retinol regularly. However whenever I use this cleanser my skin gets tight and feels tingly in the itchy way and looks scaly. I wouldn't recommend for face if you use acids regularly. I haven't tried it on my body but I think would work better for that use.

reviews.headline: will always repurchase
reviews.comments: This stuff is so good, I bought it once when it first came out, and I always repurchse when it's empty. My skin is a little dry and I love how benzoyl peroxide works but I hate how drying most formulas are. But this one this doesn't dry my skin out, I can use it every other day with no irritation. I like to let it sit for 4 minutes or so like a mask. It really helps with acne. It's also my secret ingredient for dermaplaning without breaking out. I use it before I dermaplane and after to help keep any acne bacteria from getting pushed around. 10/10.

reviews.headline: Works good!
reviews.comments: I already use the face & body lotion so I knew this would be a hit too and I was right! :-)

reviews.headline: The Best For Acne!
reviews.comments: I'm in my 40's. I've suffered from horrible acne my entire life. I have an auto inflammatory disease, so I'm truly fighting what feels like a losing battle. I have bought every single acne wash out there. The most expensive ones out there. I've bought them all. This one is hands down the best one ever! I still get zits, but it's SO much better! This is the clearest and least painful my skin has ever been. I highly recommend you save yourself lots of money and wasted years and just buy this.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: have only used a few times but so far so good

reviews.headline: Has helped my fungal cystic acne
reviews.comments: My dermatologist recommended me Panoxyl when I first began seeing her and I decided to switch and try this benzyl peroxide acne treatment instead, and I would say that it works just as well! I was breaking out all over my cheeks and jawline and within a month this has cleared up my acne. I use it every morning, and every night after double cleansing.

reviews.headline: not the best
reviews.comments: it does the job but it stains your towels

media.headline: We love and use it everyday
media.caption: Favorite wash

faceoff_positive.comments: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Wash does its job exactly as advertised. It is easy to use, and effective. It does not have any harsh odor and it is not irritating at all. The cream is a smooth, easy to use product. The product is a great size at 5 fluid ounces and lathers very well. I have used it in the shower as a full body wash and at the sink as part of my daily skincare routine. What I like about it is the 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment really makes me feel like I am cleaning out my pores and helping my body fight acne. I would want you to know to be sure you wear sunscreen while using this product. It is the best thing you can do to be sure you don't sunburn. I be sure to use this in conjunction with my daily skincare routine and moisturize completely to ensure my skin is in the best condition. Compared to similar products I have used this is a strong product with strong results. I would buy this product for myself or others looking for an easy to use, easy to buy effective acne treatment product. I think finding the right product for you is an important step to make sure you use it multiple times a day, as directed. I would recommend my family and friends try this product if they're looking for an effective acne foaming cream wash. All in all it has been great and I'm happy to continue to use it.I love that the box is recyclable and that the product is made in the US. I also love that there is a very clearly printed expiration date with a long timeline before product expiration.
faceoff_positive.headline: Effective and easy!

faceoff_negative.comments: My experience with this product was absolutely horrible!!! I am currently struggling with the long term effects of using this. I bought this product to help with acne and followed the directions exactly how it was stated to help get rid of my acne and it made it 100 times worse. I should have stopped using it right away but kept using because I wanted to get past the "purging" stage. Please use my experience and do not use this product. Your skin will be better off without this product. I have now spent hundreds of dollars to get rid of the damages that were left by this product and I still don't see a light at the end of the tunnel. What this product has done to my face and my confidence is sad.
faceoff_negative.headline: BEWARE: DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT
